categories: Category:Knights of the Old Republic news organs

nodes.text: The Adjudicator Special Report: The Outer Rim
The Adjudicator Special Report: The Outer Rim was the edition of The Adjudicator that was included with Knights of the Old Republic 14.

The text expresses dismay about how the Mandalorians ruined the Bounty Hunters' work. It ends by saying that the Mandalorians would make good bounty hunters themselves if the situations were different. This is a reference to the fact that the most well-known bounty hunters of the Skywalker Era (Jango Fett, Boba Fett) are Mandalorians.
